        public Criteria getLastBestProviderCriteria()

        Gets the criteria value used in the last call to getBestProvider(android.location.Criteria, boolean).

        Returns:
        the criteria used to find the best provider

      • getLastBestProviderEnabledOnly

        public boolean getLastBestProviderEnabledOnly()

        Gets the enabled value used in the last call to getBestProvider(android.location.Criteria, boolean)

        Returns:
        the enabled value used to find the best provider

      • setBestProvider

        public boolean setBestProvider(String provider,
                               boolean enabled,
                               List<Criteria> criteria)
                        throws Exception

        Sets the value to return from getBestProvider(android.location.Criteria, boolean) for the given provider

        Parameters:
        provider - name of the provider who should be considered best
        enabled - Enabled
        criteria - List of criteria
        Returns:
        false If provider is not enabled but it is supposed to be set as the best enabled provider don’t set it, otherwise true
        Throws:
        Exception - if provider is not known

      • setBestProvider

        public boolean setBestProvider(String provider,
                               boolean enabled)
                        throws Exception
        Throws:
        Exception
